name: CoSentry
description: Data Center and Managed Services provide
overview: CoSentry serves as a one source provider of business continuity and managed technical services. For over 10 years, CoSentry has provided Data Center, Co-location, Disaster Recovery and Cloud Computing solutions to demanding enterprise clients. The company also provides Technical Help Desk and Managed Internet services via a network of world-class data centers in Kansas City, MO, Omaha, NE, Papillion, NE as well as Sioux Falls, SD.
